pr_title: Send notification to the clients after importing projects

timeline.bodyText: The event notification is sent from a server to a client to notify the client certain events happened on the server side, eg. classpath was updated, projects were imported
timeline.author: fbricon

timeline.bodyText: this doesn't include pom projects for instance
timeline.author: fbricon

timeline.bodyText: I wonder if someone else will be broken by that
timeline.author: fbricon

replies.bodyText:
Hmm, Not sure about that.
At least for the VS Code side, the client itself handles the logic of receiving the notification, the exposed event is still the same.
replies.author: jdneo

timeline.author: fbricon
